Name: Scheltema
Review Text: We went for a quick bite to eat and this cafe did not disappoint! Service was fast, kind, and helpful. Food was delicious! The onion soup was some of the best I’ve ever had! Definitely recommend this unique cafe!

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: The place is as bad as it gets. The beer is fine but the rest? A mess. Would never recommend it. I ordered a steak medium rare....i had to butcher it myself thats how raw it was. But nevermind the salad dressing was so sour it killed all the bacteria.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Stopped by just for a quick bite to eat and a cuppa tea. You would easily miss this place as you walked by but I’m glad I came in. Very friendly service. Prices are ok but this is central Amsterdam (I’m used to London prices anyway) our …

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: It is 2021, and they dont have a card reader. I had to go through the whole tikkie process with my private number to settle the payment because the scanner of my phone could not read the bar code provided. The woman behind the bar (i guess …

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: As a novice vegetarian I really like their vegetarian option : Vega quiche! Very delicious. Other side atmosphere is quite cozy.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Me and my girl went to the Café Scheltema (we found through Google Maps). In fact, after we visited once we had to visit again because it was very tasty and enjoyable. The place is warm (literally), with wonderful service and a welcoming and excellent chef !!!  Thanks.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: A very nice place. The beer is really tasty. There is also a very friendly cat)

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Great find! This was a very small yet quaint café with local food, oldest café in Amsterdam... Btw, cash only...

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Traditional Holland cafe with authentic design, very tasty food, big portions. We took mackerel filet, onion soup, schnitzel - highly recommended! Waiters, two woman - absolutely fantastic service! Whenever I am back to Amsterdam - this is …

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Cosy bar with a rich local history. Great beers and well cooked simple food.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Great and attentive service. My husband and I really enjoyed the pea soup and authentic Dutch sausage we ordered. The apple pie was also homemade and delicious! It seems like you can't pick a bad dish here. To us travelers, it seemed to be a favorite local spot and we felt lucky to have stumbled in from the rain.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Went there with a group of friends, mostly out-of-towners. The place is rustic (a bit run down comparing with other places nearby) but is it so charming we enjoyed it a lot. The staff (which I assume were two sisters who own the place) are …

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Came here to relax after a long day, staff was friendly and the coffee was amazing. Came here from Vancouver and would definitely come back.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Real dutch experience. Where to start...we stop there after wandering and based on reviews,and they were not false. Staff is lovely and friendly and they can give you good input regarding taste. Selection of beer which is mostly belgian (as …

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: We stopped in here by chance on our last evening in Amsterdam. It was nearly empty, which often spells trouble, but we had an excellent meal, good drinks, and good service. The cat that greeted us was a bonus. It was just the right place to end our trip. Cheers.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Stumbled across this place while wandering around Amsterdam on a Saturday after a brutal week of business travel. It was exactly what I was looking for for a quick lunch. Local specials (ossenworst) and a beer. Friendly service, reasonably priced.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: This lovely place very close to Dam square was established in 1908 and still keeps its original character. It used to be the go-to establishment for journalists in the capital and you will still find wordsmiths here. …

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Fantastic service and food nice beer and wine in a lovely atmosphere

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Authentic, rustic, quiet and spacious with good service. You feel tucked in that typical Dutch atmosphere despite being in the City Centre. Make sure to get cash though beforehand, they don't take cards.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Was okay. When I asked, one of the girls told me I could sit everywhere and then suddenly the other one said 'no this one is reservated'. And the the other girls just stood there saying nothing which was a bit weird. The overall place is quite cosy which I like. The burger was not too expensive and was served very quick

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: I like the place,  my second visit to eat,  my first being on Wednesday 3rd January.  Am very pleased to have discovered this Café.  Good decent food and not overpriced.  Good friendly people working here.  Will certainly visit /eat/drink here again.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text:
Unfortunately, I can't give it  minus star.
I got cappuccino,  It was made from instant coffee.. It was horrible.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Nice cozy place where the food and drink is good. I had the steak and it was outstanding. My wife wasn't happy with her plate, but the cook came out and took care of things. …

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: This was literally the best steak I've ever had in my entire life! No joke, this meal was really good. The employees are very very nice and funny.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Homey, chill spot for beer and comfort food. The meatball was INSANE. It's a small place, but really cozy and full of locals and local expats, if you're into that kind of thing. Really lucky find.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Great family style cooking. Very Dutch and very tasty. Friendly service that tries hard to accomodate.  The soup and main meal "of the day" were excellent.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Really enjoyed this place, very enthusiastic and friendly staff who was happy to tell me about the places history. Good quality beer and food. Not on a street you'd necessarily walk down, so we were fortunate to spot this place. Worth seeking out.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: The fish of the day was very well done and come with vegetables and fries. The snitchel was good tender and big. Very satisfay. We wanted to try the apple xake, but portions were so big that we were full. Perfect!

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Seems ok. Popped on for a quick drink on way back to hotel and wasnt too impressed with the 11eur for 2 pints and even the owners friends faces showed shock at the price. There are cheaper, friendlier, more comfortable places.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Went on a trip for my birthday and stopped here for lunch, can’t fault the food, but the service was a disgrace. Was not happy with how we were treated, rude staff made us feel very uncomfortable and unwelcome, seemed to patronise us numerous times, wouldn’t reccomend this restaurant/ cafe.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: When we sat ourselves down and I grabbed two menus, the waiter glared at me and said “I am the waiter, I will get it for you. This is my job." Menu ridiculously overpriced (17eur omelette, anyone?). Tourist trap.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Best cafe/resto central Amsterdam. Amazing service and great food. Come here weekly since moving to Amsterdam 8 months ago. Highly recommend!

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Great food and atmosphere

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Arrived at 17:00 quiet. Simple tasty homely food. Just don't torment the boss his claws are sharp.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: One of the most authentic bars in Amsterdam - great food, awesome service & super friendly atmosphere. One of our fav cafe in the Dam!

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Great steak, good wine and sublime fruit chocolate cake. Staff was nice. Recommended.

Name: Scheltema
Review Text: Good Dutch food. Friendly service. And Antonio the cat! Would definitely visit again. Recommended.

Name: Scheltema
